Title: AuctionSite Starter Kit
Description: A starterkit to provide community members with an understanding of the .net 3.0 / 3.5  technology, including Ajax and LINQ
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A starterkit to provide community members with an understanding of the .net 3.0 / 3.5 technology, including Ajax and LINQ



Screenshots available
http://weblogs.asp.net/bryansampica

Demo Site
http://ask.proessent.com
Username: Testing
Password: testing!
(or feel free to register an account)

http://ask.proessent.com

Features
• Listing items for Auction
• Bidding on Auction Items
• Multiple Images per Item
• Reserve Amounts
• Category based organization
• Web 2.0 Look N’ Feel
• .NET Profile and Roles System
• SQL Express Database Model
• Complete CSS Design
• Master / Content Pages
• .NET UserControls

Data Access
• LINQ Data Access
• Extensible Data Model

Included
• Full Photoshop PSD’s
• All Images
• Example Data
• Readme.txt
• SetupGuide.txt
• SetupGuide.doc


This project was developed to show the capabilities of LINQ and the ORM portion, to speed application development.
